mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Richardson, Nathaniel P. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Richardson, Nathaniel P.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Mch 25 1863. By Telegraph from Washington 25 1863. Please telegraph Secy Stanton that it will afford you pleasure to recommission Capt CC Kepps first Va Cavalry & it will restore him please do this immediately. his attorney will see Stanton tomorrow NP Richardson Col 1st Va Cavlry 34Y83pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richardson, Nathaniel P.
Washington, D. C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
